targets.expression:
filter description like /Quota available for client/
 | sort @timestamp asc
 | stats latest(clientName) as name by clientId

targets.sqlExpression: SELECT SUM(pds_message_sent) FROM SCHEMA("comms-enrichment-metrics", campaign_id, client_id, Environment, http_status_code, sending_group_id) GROUP BY http_status_code
SELECT SUM(pds_message_sent) FROM SCHEMA("comms-reenrichment-metrics", campaign_id, client_id, Environment, http_status_code, sending_group_id) GROUP BY http_status_code

panels.title: Letter backlog (letters only sent Sunday - Thursday)

list.label: Environment
list.name: env
list.query: prod, int, internal-dev, ref, ref2, refmock, refmock2, staging, uat
